thread.title: Lay’s chips asked the internet for flavor suggestions, and things got out of hand in a hurry (34 Photos)
thread.title_full: Lay’s chips asked the internet for flavor suggestions, and things got out of hand in a hurry (34 Photos)

author: Bob
title: Lay’s chips asked the internet for flavor suggestions, and things got out of hand in a hurry (34 Photos)
text:
View as Slideshow 1 
Lay’s tried once before to crowdsource a campaign called “ Do Us A Flavor ” with the internet’s suggestions, and the answers were less than helpful the first time around. So seeing Lay’s trying the same campaign again either means that ‘no press is bad press’, or that the company is a glutton for pain. But no matter the reasoning, pranksters & trolls have been contributing all kinds of outrageous flavors that range from bad to straight cataclysmic. But all of them are amusing nevertheless. 
Enjoy the best suggestions from the internet thus far… 2
